description: Identifies significant challenges from the critique that are left unanswered in the response. Maps strategic silences where an author avoids engaging with specific critiques.
researcher_question: What significant critiques are left completely unanswered?

silences.response_gap: string - how the response fails to address this
silences.why_this_matters: string - significance of the avoided point

extraction.core_question: What significant critiques are left completely unanswered?
extraction_steps: CATALOG CRITIQUE CHALLENGES: List major challenges posed in the critique
SEARCH RESPONSE: Look for any engagement with each challenge
IDENTIFY GAPS: Note challenges with no substantive response
ASSESS SIGNIFICANCE: Evaluate how central each silence is
HYPOTHESIZE REASONS: Consider why these points are avoided
extraction.special_instructions: Distinguish between reasonable scope limitations and strategic avoidance of inconvenient challenges.

id_examples.to: Silence: No response to labor allocation critique
